scenes.description: Hololive ID members performing 'Show Them (Who You Are)'.
Hololive English members performing 'All for One'.

subtitles.original: Pada akhirnya
subtitles.english: In the end

subtitles.original: Semua kan baik saja
subtitles.english: Everything will be fine

subtitles.original: Hadapkan pandanganmu
subtitles.english: Face your gaze forward

subtitles.original: Tajam lurus ke depan
subtitles.english: Sharp straight ahead

subtitles.original: Tuk mulai bermimpi
subtitles.english: To start dreaming

subtitles.original: Bentang sayap kau cari
subtitles.english: Spread your wings and search

subtitles.original: Cahaya kan...
subtitles.english: The light will...

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: Takkan sendiri
subtitles.english: Won't be alone

subtitles.original: Just look around and see, it's so incredible
subtitles.english: Just look around and see, it's so incredible

subtitles.original: So many smiles in the sea of lights
subtitles.english: So many smiles in the sea of lights

subtitles.original: Take one step with me, and you'll be dazzled
subtitles.english: Take one step with me, and you'll be dazzled

subtitles.original: There's magic in the air tonight
subtitles.english: There's magic in the air tonight

subtitles.original: The hours zoom zoom zoom, my heart goes boom boom boom
subtitles.english: The hours zoom zoom zoom, my heart goes boom boom boom

subtitles.original: The world is brighter because you believe in me
subtitles.english: The world is brighter because you believe in me

subtitles.original: Let's shout it loud loud loud, our time is right now
subtitles.english: Let's shout it loud loud loud, our time is right now

subtitles.original: We're on the edge of destiny
subtitles.english: We're on the edge of destiny

subtitles.original: For a moment I can dream with you
subtitles.english: For a moment I can dream with you

subtitles.original: Every miracle we hope for might come true
subtitles.english: Every miracle we hope for might come true

subtitles.original: We come together reaching out from far and wide
subtitles.english: We come together reaching out from far and wide

subtitles.original: And suddenly you're here by my side
subtitles.english: And suddenly you're here by my side

subtitles.original: When our voices join in harmony tonight
subtitles.english: When our voices join in harmony tonight

subtitles.original: We're gonna shine bright together
subtitles.english: We''re gonna shine bright together

subtitles.original: We're all for one (Let's sing!)
subtitles.english: We're all for one (Let's sing!)

subtitles.original: All for one
subtitles.english: All for one

subtitles.english: The thrill of happiness is all around us

subtitles.english: Jump in 'cause it's all for one (Let's sing!)

subtitles.english: We're on our way to good times, good vibes

subtitles.original: We'll treasure this day
subtitles.english: We'll treasure this day

subtitles.original: The rest of our lives (Hey!)
subtitles.english: The rest of our lives (Hey!)

subtitles.original: Set the things in motion
subtitles.english: Set the things in motion

subtitles.original: Get ready start the celebration
subtitles.english: Get ready start the celebration

subtitles.original: Come see the wonders here beyond imagination
subtitles.english: Come see the wonders here beyond imagination

subtitles.original: We're joining hands for the world to see
subtitles.english: We're joining hands for the world to see

subtitles.original: I hope you feel the love and the energy
subtitles.english: I hope you feel the love and the energy

subtitles.original: The hours zoom zoom zoom, my heart goes boom boom boom
subtitles.english: The hours zoom zoom zoom, my heart goes boom boom boom

subtitles.english: A dizzy whirlwind of dreams and reality

subtitles.original: Let's shout it loud loud loud, our time is right now
subtitles.english: Let's shout it loud loud loud, our time is right now

subtitles.english: We're here together finally

subtitles.english: Every moment takes my breath away

subtitles.english: There's a feeling here that words cannot convey

subtitles.english: I hear the rhythm and we rise to meet the song

subtitles.english: Every voice ringing loud and clear
